issue.title: Allow gzweb to work as a headless sdfParser [doesn't need a server]

content.raw:
```hg clone https://mohamd_ayman@bitbucket.org/mohamd_ayman/sdfviewer_draft```

```npm install```

```./start_sdfviewer_demo.sh```

This is a demo using the ```gz3d.js``` as it is and adding some functions to ```sdf_viewer.js```, I forgot the lights so I'll be working on them.
Joints and the links are giving me the same problems the I had during the model spawning tests, It sure has sth to do with ```gzserver``` not being up, I'll be working on that too after I'm done with the lights.
content.html:
hg clone https://mohamd_ayman@bitbucket.org/mohamd_ayman/sdfviewer_draft

npm install

./start_sdfviewer_demo.sh

This is a demo using the gz3d.js as it is and adding some functions to sdf_viewer.js, I forgot the lights so I'll be working on them. Joints and the links are giving me the same problems the I had during the model spawning tests, It sure has sth to do with gzserver not being up, I'll be working on that too after I'm done with the lights.
